name: ESRScan
body:
### Mobile App
ESRScan is currently in private beta phase. Official iTunes download links will follow soon.

### Desktop App
The Desktop App is used for receiving scans from the mobile app. Download it below in order to get started.

* [OSX](ESRScan.dmg)

Windows and Linux support will follow as soon as we got around to test them. You're [welcome to chime in and help!](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
